info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 3:08PM EDT until April 17 at 9:48AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana...
Wabash River.
Wildcat Creek near Lafayette.
.Lowland flooding has developed along the length of the Wabash River due to rainfall of generally three to eight inches in the Wabash basin. Significant flooding is expected to develop on the lower Wabash at Mount Carmel. The crest on the Wabash was near Montezuma Monday afternoon and is expected to reach Riverton Thursday morning and Mount Carmel on Sunday.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River at Vincennes.
* WHEN...Until Thursday, April 17.
* IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Extensive agricultural flooding in progress in areas that are not protected by levees. In Lawrence County Illinois, River Road is flooded from the Lincoln Memorial Bridge to the east edge of Billett.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EDT Monday /1:45 PM CDT Monday/ the stage was 20.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EDT Monday /1:45 PM CDT Monday/ was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 20.2 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall early Wednesday afternoon. It will rise to 20.9 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, April 16. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Tuesday morning by around 615 AM EDT /515 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY, APRIL 17

area.areaDesc: Lawrence, IL; Wabash, IL; Knox, IN
